description: Factor level shows magnesium fertilizer treatment

Factor level shows magnesium fertilizer treatment. Previously 11 kgMg/ha until 1973, then 35kgMg every third year 1974-2000,(except 30kg Mg 1992, 1995, 1998). 2001 onwards applied annually. Applied as Kieserite (a form of magnesium sulfate).

Factor level shows magnesium fertilizer treatment. Previously 5.5 kgMg/ha until 1973, then 17.5 kgMg every third year 1974-2000 (except 15kgMg 1992, 1995, 1998). 2001 onwards applied annually. Applied as Kieserite (a form of magnesium sulfate). Applied to strips 17 and 18.
Factor level shows magnesium fertilizer treatment. Previously 31 kg Mg/ha 1968-1973. Applied as Kieserite (a form of magnesium sulfate) to strip 14.
Factor level shows previous magnesium fertilizer treatment, until 2000. 30 kg Mg/ha 1974-2000, 31 kg Mg/ha 1968-1973. Applied as Kieserite (a form of magnesium sulfate).
Factor level shows magnesium fertilizer treatment. Applied as Kieserite (a form of magnesium sulfate). Plus 60kgMg/ha in autumn 2000 only.
